Augmented Reality Display: Enhance the television display to incorporate augmented reality technology, allowing users to overlay digital content onto real-world environments for a more immersive viewing experience.
Interactive 3D Content: Implement the ability to create and view 3D content on the television, allowing users to interact with virtual objects and environments in real-time.
Personalized Content Recommendations: Utilize machine learning algorithms to analyze a user's viewing history and provide personalized content recommendations based on their preferences.

Multi-Device Connectivity: Allow for seamless connectivity between the television and other devices, such as smartphones and tablets, to enable casting, streaming, and other features without the need for additional hardware.
Built-in Speakers: Incorporate high-quality speakers into the television to provide an improved audio experience without the need for external speakers or soundbars.
